duties_responsibilities.duty: Work cross-functionally with Clinical Affairs, Clin Ops, and Data Management teams to support data analysis and reporting for all clinical trial and submission work.
Serve as the primary point of contact with CROs and assist in the development and validation of programming specs, SDTM mapping specs, and ADaM specs.
Lead and guide the team in the implementation of statistical programs for clinical trial data analysis and reporting.
Provide expertise in SAS, clinical trial programming, data steps, procedures, SAS/MACRO, SAS/GRAPH, systems, and database management.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. with 2+ years, MS with 6+, BS with 8+ years of programming experience in the biopharmaceutical industry
